structural_unit_name.en: School of Economics and Business Administration

description.en:
Students can practice in different companies and organizations (ministries, agencies, local governments, banks, universities, OÜ, NGOs, etc.), set up their own company, participate in research groups or participate in projects. The student chooses the type of internship according to his / her developmental needs and outcomes of the curriculum. The internship supervisors are the internship coordinator at the university and a supervisor from the company / oraganisation side.
During the internship, the student has to follow the tasks set in Moodle. One of the essential outcomes of the internship is the student's self-analysis, in which he/she identifies what he/she has learned, his/her strengths and weaknesses, and the feedback of the supervisor (organization) to his/her activities.
https://sisu.ut.ee/internship
description.et:
Üliõpilane võib praktika sooritada erinevates ettevõtetes ja organisatsioonides (ministeeriumid, ametid, kohalikud omavalitsused, pangad, ülikoolid; OÜ, MTÜ jt.), luua oma ettevõtte, osaleda uurimisgruppide töös või osaleda projektide elluviimisel. Praktika liigi valib üliõpilane vastavalt oma arenguvajadustele ja lähtuvalt õppekava praktika eesmärgist. Praktika juhendajateks on ülikooli poolt praktika koordinaator ja ettevõtte poolne juhendaja.
Praktika ajal lähtub tudeng ülesannetest Moodlis. Praktika üheks oluliseks väljundiks on üliõpilase eneseanalüüs, mille käigus ta toob välja õpitu, oma tugevused ja nõrkused. Praktikajuhendaja (organisatsioonipoolse) tagasiside tema tegevusele on ka praktika kohustuslik osa.
https://sisu.ut.ee/praktikamajanduses/avaleht

objectives.en: The aim of the internship is to develop student's ability to solve practical problems related to the curriculum, and to apply skills and knowledge acquired during their studies in work environment.
objectives.et: Praktika eesmärk on arendada tudengi oskust lahendada õppekava temaatikaga seotud praktilisi probleeme ja rakendada õpingute käigus omandatud teadmisi ja oskusi töökeskkonnas.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who has passed the subject can:
*	set work tasks and plan time;
learning_outcomes.et: *	püstitada endale tööülesandeid ja planeerida aega;

learning_outcomes.en: *	apply acquired knowledge in the working environment;
learning_outcomes.et: *	rakendada õpingute käigus omandatud teadmisi töö valdkonnas

learning_outcomes.en: *	identify and analyze problems based on the set of tasks in the working environment;
learning_outcomes.et: * 	määratleda ja analüüsida probleeme lähtuvalt oma praktika ülesannete püstitusest;

learning_outcomes.en: *	analyze internship experiences, evaluate one's own development;
learning_outcomes.et: *	analüüsida enda praktika kogemusi ja hinnata enda arengut.

independent_work.et:
The student must prepare a detailed internship action plan. The internship action plan sets out aims and goals for the internship, a timetable and a list of activities that the student plans to carry out during the internship.
At the end of the internship, the student must submit a final report summarizing the results of the internship, evaluating the completion of the timetable and critically analyzing the knowledge and skills learned during the internship.

grade_preconditions.et:
An action plan and final report are required for access to the calculation.

In order to successfully complete the internship, students have to:
- find a suitable internship which responds to the program focus (Asia/ Middle East) and discuss it with the supervisor at the university
- submit an internship action plan (before starting the internship)
- submit a final report with self-analysis
- feedback from the internship supervisor
